short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically extract Spotify cookies for Spotube. Listen to music for free with Spotube without a premium subscription.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you love music but wish you could enjoy all the premium features for free?

Meet the Cookie Extractor for Spotube, your ultimate solution for unlocking the full potential of music streaming through Spotube, the open-source music player.

==============================

FEATURES

☆ AUTOMATIC 'SP_DC' COOKIE EXTRACTION: Click the extension icon in the toolbar to automatically detect and extract the 'sp_dc' cookie required for Spotube.
☆ SEAMLESS INTEGRATION: Easily use the extracted 'sp_dc' cookie within Spotube to enjoy premium features without a subscription.
☆ USER-FRIENDLY INTERFACE: Automates the process of extracting cookies, eliminating the need for manual searches through developer tools.
☆ FREE AND OPEN-SOURCE: Ensures transparency and community-driven development.

==============================

HOW IT WORKS

1. INSTALL THE EXTENSION: Download and install the Cookie Extractor for Spotube from the Chrome Web Store.
2. LOG IN TO SPOTIFY: Sign in to your Spotify account via your web browser.
3. AUTOMATIC COOKIE EXTRACTION: Click the extension icon in the toolbar to automatically extract the 'sp_dc' cookie.
4. ENTER THE COOKIE: Open Spotube on Windows and paste the copied 'sp_dc' from the Chrome extension.
5. DOWNLOAD SPOTUBE: Visit the Spotube GitHub page to download and install the latest version for your operating system.

==============================

DETAILED STEPS TO EXTRACT 'SP_DC' MANUALLY

For users interested in the manual process, here's how to extract the 'sp_dc' cookie using developer tools:

1. OPEN SPOTIFY IN YOUR BROWSER: Log in to your Spotify account.
2. OPEN DEVELOPER TOOLS: Press F12 or right-click on the page and select Inspect to open the developer tools.
3. NAVIGATE TO THE APPLICATION TAB: Go to the 'Application' tab in the developer tools.
4. FIND THE 'SP_DC' COOKIE: Under 'Storage' -> 'Cookies', locate and copy the value of the 'sp_dc' cookie.
5. COPY THE COOKIE VALUE: Use the copied cookie value in Spotube for access to premium features.

This manual method can be cumbersome, which is why the Cookie Extractor for Spotube automates the entire process, saving you time and effort.

==============================

LEGAL NOTE

* This extension allows users to access features using a free account. Spotube integrates to fetch playlists and track information while streaming music from YouTube or other sources. This ensures users can enjoy a rich music experience without needing a premium subscription. Users can create playlists, add songs, and enjoy music seamlessly.
We encourage users to support artists and the music industry by subscribing to premium services if possible.
==============================

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK

We are constantly working to improve our extension. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for new features, please visit our GitHub repository or contact us via support email.
Join our community and help us make Cookie Extractor for Spotube even better. Unlock the full potential of your music experience with Cookie Extractor for Spotube today!"
